file_content.text: You anger the Mountain, Republic scum. You provoke a fury you will not survive.
When the Mountain rages, the ground shakes and the skies turn black!
You're the fabled Jedi killer? Shouldn't you be taller?
I'm not impressed.
Your Force is useless against the Mountain, foolish Jedi.
You have a problem with your temper, my friend. I recommend counseling.
Try some anger management.
Talk all you like, foolish Jedi. It will not save you from the Mountain.
Stop talking me to death and fight like a... whatever-you-are.
Less talk, more action.
Fool. If the Jedi cannot stand against the Mountain, what hope do you have?
Any man who talks about himself in the third person is clearly an idiot.
Boy, are you annoying.
You don't understand the Mountain, stupid spacer--but you will.
We don't have to fight.
The Mountain will never make peace with the Republic--or you.
I'm going to kill you.
The Mountain will crush you all like insects.
The Mountain will crush you like an insect.
Come to these coordinates. If you do not, thousands will die.
Explain yourself.
You can't intimidate me.
If you don't fear for yourself, fear for the helpless innocents.
That's an empty threat.
You gamble with innocent lives.
The Kintan Kings have hidden explosives all over your Republic spaceport--but the detonator is here.
Come and face the Mountain, or scores of your people will perish in smoke and flame.
Leave those innocent people alone. I'll face you.
Don't hurt them.
I'm on my way.
You just signed your own death mark, you cowardly pile of filth.
Prepare to meet your maker.
The Mountain will see you in hell, Republic scum.
